text: Kandi abemera ibimenyetso byacu nibaza bakugana, ujye ubaramutsa uvuga uti "Salamu alaykum (Amahoro ya Allah abe kuri mwe)". Nyagasani wanyu yiyemeje kugira impuhwe kugira ngo uzakora ikibi muri mwe kubera ubujiji, maze nyuma yo kugikora akicuza akanakora ibikorwa byiza (azamubabarire).
